name: Revo Uninstaller Pro Activation File
summary: A RUPAF file is a data file used by Revo Uninstaller Pro, a program used to uninstall programs, Windows apps, and plug-ins. It contains subscription registration information, which includes the name of the user and serial number. RUPAF files are used to activate or update a subscription of Revo Uninstaller Pro if the user does not have an Internet connection.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
